item.title: Attempting to Predict March Madness with Machine Learning
item.description: Alright folks, here we are. The first of (hopefully) many blog posts, and this one is on a project that has been an absolute blast. For my Advanced Sports Data course, my professor gave us the assignment of using our choice of various machine learning methods to create a model to predict the outcome of menâ€™s college basketball games based on prior data, and use that model to attempt to find the results of the NCAA tournament this year.

item.title: Full March Madness 2021 Bracket
item.description: Just in case you wanted to see my full ESPN bracket, here it is: https://fantasy.espn.com/tournament-challenge-bracket/2021/en/entry?entryID=48742608
